#summary notes for first sc18 workshop

SC18 workshop


tDAR background and existing functionality
	server-based product - not a desktop app
		integrates many components
		open source
	archive repository of digital objects (documents, datasets, images)
		capture data and metadata
	pgAdmin view of the uploaded databases
	message: everything retained as it was:
		files stored as uploaded
		tables extracted out of files and copied into a postgresql server
		no normalization or transformation - just a copy
what we intend to add:
	object-level data entry/maintenance/reporting
	customising import process, automating it to make it less fiddly - streamline
	linking images to object-level metadata
	publication of metadata to ARDC
